attributes.action: stop all benefits to all non british citizens and muslim extremists now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: they are a drain on the countries finances,they shouldnt be here anyway,the money you saved should be used for helping pensioners and wounded soldiers,fund more hospitals..the muslim extremists should be deported

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
